text.not_found_line_1: Looks like you've found a page that I'm still working on. I will try to finish it as soon as possible.
text.not_found_line_2: Meanwhile, breathe in, and on the out breath, click here and contemplate a super cool landscape.

text.line_1: Do you want to collaborate on a project? Just want to say hi? Go ahead and send me something!
text.name: Name
text.sentFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

text.line_1: All images and videos presented on this website are owned by Bruno Costa, are protected by copyright and cannot be used for any personal or commercial purposes without prior agreement or licensing. Contact me for permission.
text.line_2: You can share images/videos on personal social networks, as long as you give credit (© Bruno Costa) and tag (check my social media handles at the bottom of the page).

consent_modal.title: Cookies provide a personalized experience
consent_modal.description:
I'm not talking about the crunchy, tasty kind 😋
These cookies help keep this website safe and personalise its use. They won't be turn on unless you accept. For more information, please see the Cookie Policy.

settings_modal.title: Preferences
settings_modal.subtitle: Cookie usage 📢
settings_modal.description: Learn more about the types of cookies that are used and select the ones you consent to.
settings_modal.strictly_necessary_cookies_description: Own and third-party cookies that ensure the website works properly.
settings_modal.performance_and_analytics_cookies_descri: Cookies that anonymously collect and analyze information about the use of the website, allowing to improve and personalize the navigation experience.
settings_modal.more_information_description: You may at any time learn more about the cookies and change your preferences on the cookies page.

text.page_what_are_cookies_line_1: Cookies are small, unique text files that a website sends to your computer when you visit it - these can be session cookies which terminate when you close a browser, or persistent cookies which will remain until you delete them. For example, a persistent cookie is being used with your language selection, so you don't need to select it each time you visit the site.
text.page_what_are_cookies_line_2: For more details about cookies you can visit www.aboutcookies.org.
text.page_how_do_we_use_cookies_line_1: In addition to the cookie that persists the language selection, the following services are also beeing used which in turn may also use cookies:
text.page_how_do_we_use_cookies_google_analyt: Google Analytics - Used to collect anonymized information about how visitors navigate the site. The information is used to compile reports to help improve the user experience.
text.page_how_do_we_use_cookies_line_2: For more information, get in touch.
text.page_cookie_preferences: How can you change your cookies preferences?
text.page_cookie_preferences_line_1: You can authorise or reject the various cookies at any time and according to your preferences. To do so, simply access the configuration window:

text.quote_1: A magic dwells in each beginning, protecting us, telling us how to live.

details.gear: Sony A7 + FE 28-70 mm F3.5-5.6 OSS

text.quote_1_1: Nothing in the world was ever seen

details.gear: Sony A7 + FE 28-70 mm F3.5-5.6 OSS

text.quote_1: You did not kill the fish only to keep alive and to sell for food, he thought. You killed him for pride and because you are a fisherman. You loved him when he was alive and you loved him after. If you love him, it is not a sin to kill him. Or is it more?
text.quote_1_author: Ernest Hemingway, The Old Man and the Sea

details.gear: Sony A7 + FE 28-70 mm F3.5-5.6 OSS

text.quote_1: Glorious, stirring sight! The poetry of motion! The real way to travel! The only way to travel! Here today-in next week tomorrow! Villages skipped, towns and cities jumped - always somebody else's horizon! O bliss! O poop-poop! O my! O my!
text.quote_1_author: Kenneth Grahame, The Wind in the Willows

details.gear: Sony A7 + FE 28-70 mm F3.5-5.6 OSS

text.line_1: Alfacinhas or little lettuces is a familiar name given to the residents of Lisbon.
text.line_2: This term was popularized by Almeida Garrett in his book Viagens na Minha Terra, in which he refers, at a certain point,
text.quote_1: Hence you will be alfacinhas forever, caring that all the squares of the world are like that of Terreiro do Paço.
text.line_3: The author ended up not explaining the reason for this name, so the truth is that this food gave its name to the residents of Lisbon and nobody knows why.
text.line_4: On a weekend well spent in the magnificent Portuguese capital, I had the opportunity to capture its residents through my lens, always from an interesting perspective and, above all, with a balanced composition.

details.gear: Fujifilm X-T3 + XF 35mm f/2 R WR

text.quote_1_1: Ericeira, Where the Sea is Bluest
text.quote_1_1_translation_source: Ericeira, Onde o Mar é Mais Azul

details.gear: Fujifilm X-T3 + XF 35mm f/2 R WR

text.quote_1_3_translation_source: O herói a si assiste, vário

details.gear: Fujifilm X-T3 + XF 35mm f/2 R WR

text.quote_1_1: Street full of empty sunlight. Walled houses, people walking.
text.quote_1_1_translation_source: Na rua cheia de sol vago há casas paradas e gente que anda.
text.quote_1_2_translation_source: Uma tristeza cheia de pavor esfria-me.
text.quote_1_3: I foresee something happening behind the façades, in the movement.
text.quote_1_3_translation_source: Pressinto um acontecimento do lado de lá das frontarias e dos movimentos.
text.quote_1_5: Anything but knowing what the Mystery is!
text.quote_1_5_translation_source: Tudo menos saber o que é o Mistério!
text.quote_1_6: Surface of the Universe, O Lowered Eyelids,
text.quote_1_6_translation_source: Superfície do Universo, ó Pálpebras Descidas,
text.quote_1_8: The sight of Ultimate Truth couldn't be endured!
text.quote_1_8_translation_source: O olhar da Verdade Final não deve poder suportar-se!
text.quote_1_9: Let me live without knowing anything, and die without coming to know anything!
text.quote_1_9_translation_source: Deixai-me viver sem saber nada, e morrer sem ir saber nada!
text.quote_1_10: The reason for being, the reason for there being beings, for everything being,
text.quote_1_10_translation_source: A razão de haver ser, a razão de haver seres, de haver tudo,
text.quote_1_11: Would bring on a madness greater than the spaces
text.quote_1_11_translation_source: Deve trazer uma loucura maior que os espaços
text.quote_1_12_translation_source: Entre as almas e entre as estrelas.
text.quote_1_13: No, no, not the truth! Leave me these houses and these people,
text.quote_1_13_translation_source: Não, não, a verdade não! Deixai-me estas casas e esta gente;
text.quote_1_14: Just this, nothing else, these houses and these people...
text.quote_1_14_translation_source: Assim mesmo, sem mais nada, estas casas e esta gente...
text.quote_1_15: What cold horrible breath touches my closed eyes?
text.quote_1_15_translation_source: Que bafo horrível e frio me toca em olhos fechados?
text.quote_1_16: I don't want to open them from living! O Truth, forget about me!
text.quote_1_16_translation_source: Não os quero abrir de viver! Ó Verdade, esquece-te de mim!

details.gear: Fujifilm X-T3 + XF 35mm f/2 R WR
